item.title: Man, 40s, questioned after fatal hit-and-run in Limerick
item.description: A man in his 40s is continuing to be questioned by gardaí investigating a fatal hit-and-run incident in Co Limerick at the weekend.

item.title: Tributes paid to man killed after car entered Grand Canal
item.description: Tributes have been paid to a man who died after the car he was driving entered the Grand Canal in Co Kildare.
